Please.description: A catchy pop anthem that captures the struggle of pursuing your dreams while juggling life’s demands.

7_rings.description: A bold, self-empowered pop track celebrating wealth, independence, and friendship, with a catchy hook and luxurious vibes.

All_I_want.description: A soulful ballad that highlights Mariah's iconic vocal range, touching on themes of longing and romantic yearning.

Jupiter_and_Mars.description: An atmospheric rock song that takes the listener on a celestial journey with dreamy guitar riffs and introspective lyrics.

Alive.description: An uplifting song about overcoming life's challenges, featuring powerful vocals and a driving melody.

Always_Waiting.description: A smooth jazz track that conveys the feelings of anticipation and hope with a soothing saxophone and laid-back groove.

Erase.description: A high-energy electronic song about moving forward and forgetting the past, with pulsing beats and vibrant synths.

Dame_Mas.description: A lively Latin pop track that mixes catchy rhythms and a playful melody, perfect for dancing.

Good_Morning.description: A soulful track with uplifting lyrics that make it a perfect morning pick-me-up, combining smooth vocals and a jazzy beat.

Goodbar_Good_Night.description: An energetic funk song that captures the excitement of nightlife with a catchy bassline and groovy rhythm.

I_Got_a_Boy.description: A vibrant K-pop song with a mix of rap and melodic vocals, known for its upbeat tempo and catchy chorus.

Love_of_My_Life.description: A classic rock ballad that remains timeless, featuring heartfelt lyrics and emotional guitar solos.

Mr_Rock.description: A modern rock song with a catchy riff and upbeat lyrics, embodying the spirit of contemporary rock.

Reason_to_Stay.description: A reflective pop song with emotional lyrics about love and the challenges of staying in a relationship.

Stranger_Things.description: A moody, alternative track with a haunting melody that explores themes of feeling out of place and finding one's identity.

Use.description: A catchy electronic pop song that’s perfect for the dance floor, with an infectious beat and memorable lyrics.

Fire_fighter.description: An energetic electronic pop track with a fiery beat, symbolizing resilience and strength in the face of adversity.
